items.sentence: Tom left his parents\' house this spring and has been living alone since then.
It hasn\'t been easy for Tom to earn enough money to support his large family.
Tom is pretty good at baseball, but he\'s not good enough to play on our team.
I was too short to reach the top shelf, so I asked Tom to get the book for me.
Tom isn\'t the only one who thinks it would be a good idea to get there early.
